Package ccaffeine

 To write ccaffeine-free code based on the CCA-specification and run it in any framework, wrap the code in this interface. More...

 We would really like to make this a cross-language list of static final string constants in the package namespace. More...

Detailed Description

Ccaffeine is an in-core component framework for HPC and the contrib/ccafe files are published for anyone to reuse in their own framworks or build against without having the full Ccaffeine installation available.

With luck, this will promote prototyping common services across frameworks and will keep the developers of Ccaffeine more disciplined about changing the public interfaces of Ccaffeine.
